statements: SELECT id, date, operation_cost, revenue FROM landfill_financial_data;
SELECT date, revenue, operation_cost, id FROM landfill_financial_data;
SELECT operation_cost, date, revenue, id FROM landfill_financial_data;
SELECT id, revenue FROM landfill_financial_data;
SELECT * FROM landfill_financial_data;
SELECT id, date FROM landfill_financial_data WHERE operation_cost > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM landfill_financial_data WHERE revenue < 5000 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(operation_cost) AS average_cost, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM landfill_financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, operation_cost, revenue FROM landfill_financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM landfill_financial_data WHERE operation_cost >= 500 AND revenue < 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_type = 'Transportation';
SELECT cost_amount, cost_description FROM landfill_costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT cost_description, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_description LIKE '%machinery%';
SELECT AVG(cost_amount) AS average_cost FROM landfill_costs
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000
SELECT cost_type, cost_description, cost_date FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount < 500
SELECT cost_type, cost_description, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_type LIKE '%transport%'
SELECT cost_type, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs ORDER BY cost_id DESC;
SELECT cost_category, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT cost_category FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_category LIKE 'E%';
SELECT SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM landfill_costs;
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount > 10000 ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT revenue_category FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_amount < 5000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM budget_allocation
SELECT allocation_id, allocation_category FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocation_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY allocation_amount ASC
SELECT cost_category, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM landfill_costs GROUP BY cost_category HAVING total_cost > 50000
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cost_type, cost_description, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT date, revenue_type, revenue_description FROM revenue_streams WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT department, allocation_description, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT resource_type, optimization_strategy, performance_metric FROM resource_optimization ORDER BY performance_metric DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM landfill_costs ORDER BY date DESC, cost_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT cost_type, cost_description, cost_amount FROM landfill_costs WHERE cost_amount > 5000 AND cost_type LIKE 'Processing%' ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM landfill_costs WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT revenue_type, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_streams GROUP BY revenue_type HAVING SUM(revenue_amount) > 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE department = 'Finance' AND allocated_amount >= 50000 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM landfill_operations;
SELECT operation_type, operation_cost FROM landfill_operations WHERE operation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT operation_type FROM landfill_operations ORDER BY operation_type DESC;
SELECT operation_date, operation_cost FROM landfill_operations WHERE operation_cost > 1000 ORDER BY operation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_operations, AVG(operation_cost) AS avg_cost FROM landfill_operations;
SELECT * FROM landfill_operations WHERE landfill_id = 'abc123';
SELECT operation_type, operation_cost FROM landfill_operations WHERE operation_revenue > 1000;
SELECT operation_date, operation_type, operation_cost FROM landfill_operations WHERE operation_cost < 500 AND operation_revenue > 2000;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role, staff_salary FROM landfill_staff WHERE landfill_id = 'xyz789';
SELECT budget_category, budget_allocation FROM landfill_budget WHERE budget_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
